content: this legal document provides an update on the progress of a case involving a company and a notary the document does not provide specific details about the case or the parties involved it mentions that witnesses have testified about the marriage and the absence of a marriage contract the parties have agreed on the division of assets property rights and settlement of debts the document also addresses provisions regarding property transfer flood risk areas and environmental regulations the parties acknowledge their obligations and liabilities including debts and taxes they agree to abandon grievances and future assets and liabilities the document also discusses inheritance rights spousal support and the use of surnames the agreements will take effect upon certain events such as the filing of the divorce petition and the judgment of divorce the parties agree to provisional application of the agreements and the sharing of costs the document also mentions the performance of an election domicile but does not provide further details another part of the document relates to the certification of civil status for a mortgage application without mentioning the parties involved or specific details the document also explains that the notary collects personal information from the parties such as their names dates of birth and addresses the parties are required to provide proof of identity and declare their capacity to act they also have the right to appoint another notary and be assisted by legal counsel if there are conflicting interests the document was prepared and signed by the parties in the presence of the notary with a fiveday review period
